document.full_text: iran announced wednesday it has successfully launched a research rocket carrying a mouse, two turtles and worms into space -- a feat president mahmoud ahmadinejad said showed iran could defeat the west in the battle of technology.
document.title: iran sends rocket with animal menagerie into space
lines_and_colors: iran announced wednesday it has successfully launched a research rocket carrying a mouse, two turtles and worms into space -- a feat president mahmoud ahmadinejad said showed iran could defeat the west in the battle of technology.
